messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] We lost our baby boy
messages.msgSnippet: I m very sorry for your loss.  I hope that the words of those with similar experiences are a great comfort to you. Karen
messages.messageBody:
I'm very sorry for your loss. I hope that the words of those with
similar experiences are a great comfort to you.

Karen

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] We lost our baby boy
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/21/02 12:06:03 PM, hoffmanwilson@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/21/02 12:06:03 PM, hoffmanwilson@... writes:

<< Our baby boy arrived last night, stillborn, one day
shy of his due date. He was named Angel Xavier Max
Henry Wilson, one name given by each of us. >>

I am so sad and sorry for your family.
Thanks for trusting us with your sorrowful news, though.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: We lost our baby boy
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m very sorry for your loss. It s been over 9 years since we lost our son Jay. Though it seems a life time ago, he has always been very much a part of our
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@y..., Dana Matt <hoffmanwilson@y...> wrote:
> Our baby boy arrived last night, stillborn, one day
> shy of his due date. He was named Angel Xavier Max
> Henry Wilson, one name given by each of us. Labor was
> very quick, and I am going no-mail on all my lists
> while I recover. Thank you all for your prayers.
>
> Dana and Matt
>

I'm very sorry for your loss.
It's been over 9 years since we lost our son Jay.
Though it seems a life time ago, he has always been very much a part
of our lives.
Through all the pain, I have always considered him a blessing to us,
and can vividly remember the joy he brought to us for the eight
months I carried him, and the joy he still brings to us in all of the
memories of the beauty he brought out in our family and friends in
that time of mourning.
I love your sons name and the idea of each of you giving him one.

Joanna

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] We lost our baby boy
messages.msgSnippet: Dana and Matt, It may seem like this is more pain than anyone can bear.  But God is here with you, and your Christian family is standing with you too. I am so
messages.messageBody:
Dana and Matt,

It may seem like this is more pain than anyone can bear. But God is here with you, and your Christian family is standing with you too."

I am so sorry to hear about your lose and you and your family are in our deepest prayers.

Charles and Young Whittom

Sent: Sunday, July 21, 2002 1:05 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] We lost our baby boy


Our baby boy arrived last night, stillborn, one day
shy of his due date. He was named Angel Xavier Max
Henry Wilson, one name given by each of us. Labor was
very quick, and I am going no-mail on all my lists
while I recover. Thank you all for your prayers.

Dana and Matt

{{{{{{Dana and Matt}}}}}}
The only words I can say are...I'm so sorry, and I know they just
pale in comparison with what you are feeling right now.

Meghan

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] We lost our baby boy
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m so sorry to hear that, Dana.  There are no words, are there? Nancy
messages.messageBody:

> Our baby boy arrived last night, stillborn, one day
> shy of his due date. He was named Angel Xavier Max
> Henry Wilson, one name given by each of us. Labor was

Nancy
